title: Facsimile Using Internet Mail (IFAX) Service of ENUM
abstract:
This document describes the functional specification and definition of
the ENUM Naming Authority Pointer
(NAPTR) record for IFax service.  IFax is "facsimile using Internet
mail".  For this use, the Domain Name System (DNS) returns the email
address of the referenced IFax system.  This mechanism allows
email-based fax communication to use telephone numbers instead of requiring
the sender to already know the recipient email address.  [STANDARDS-TRACK]
